title: Household savings are moving from banks to mutual funds impacting liquidity: RBI Governor Das
description: RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das noted a significant shift in household investment behavior during his speech at the FE Modern BFSI Summit 2024. Traditionally favoring banks, households are now increasingly investing in capital markets and financial intermediaries, such as mutual funds, insurance funds, and pension funds.
